column1: Smoque BBQ////I picked up some brisket
column5: and the BBQ beans. They were all fantastic
column6: and fulfilled my craving. The brisket had a deep smoke line
column7: nice char and great flavor. One of the owners was manning the cash register
column8: and she provided me with all of their sauces to try. I'm a bigger fan of the smoky
column9: spicy BBQ sauces as opposed to those of the sweet variety. The ribs were pretty good too
column10: but I wouldn't call them lights out.
